content.verses:
[
    [0] {
      order: 1
      type: verse
      hawaiian_text: 
      | ʻAkahi hoʻi a ʻike kuʻu maka
      | I ka nani aʻo Waiakea
      | ʻAʻohe lua e like ai
      | Me ka nani a me ka nani
      | Aʻo Kūhiō Bay
      | Mahalo aʻe au i ka nani aʻo Hilo
      | Me ka ua aʻe hoʻopulu nei
      | ʻOni ana Mokuola au i ke kai
      | ʻOua ʻāina e
      | Kaulana nei
      | Wai ānuenue a he wai kaulana
      | Wai makaʻikaʻi a ka malihini
      | Wai kamahaʻo i kaʻu ʻike
      | E papahi e hoʻope nei
      | I ka nahele
      english_text: 
      | This is the first time I saw
      | for myself
      | The beauty of Waiakea
      | There is no other that can
      | compare
      | With the beauty, the
      | beauty
      | Of Kūhiō Bay
      | I admire the beauty of
      | Hilo
      | The rain drenches it
      | Mokuola stands out in the
      | sea
      | Island that is
      | Known to all
      hawaiian_lines: [ʻAkahi hoʻi a ʻike kuʻu maka, I ka nani aʻo Waiakea, ʻAʻohe lua e like ai, Me ka nani a me ka nani, Aʻo Kūhiō Bay, Mahalo aʻe au i ka nani aʻo Hilo, Me ka ua aʻe hoʻopulu nei, ʻOni ana Mokuola au i ke kai, ʻOua ʻāina e, Kaulana nei, Wai ānuenue a he wai kaulana, Wai makaʻikaʻi a ka malihini, Wai kamahaʻo i kaʻu ʻike, E papahi e hoʻope nei, I ka nahele]
      english_lines: [This is the first time I saw, for myself, The beauty of Waiakea, There is no other that can, compare, With the beauty, the, beauty, Of Kūhiō Bay, I admire the beauty of, Hilo, The rain drenches it, Mokuola stands out in the, sea, Island that is, Known to all]
    }
  ]
